name: Chapter 15: The New Beginning
short_description: The group enters the ocean, celebrating their newfound freedom. They bid farewell to each other as they each set off to explore their new world, forever changed by their journey.
events: Entering the ocean, celebration, farewells, new adventures.

beats.description: Bubbles and his friends take their first look at the vast ocean, awestruck by its beauty and enormity.
Bubbles and the group swim freely in the open water, reveling in the sensation of unconfined space and limitless possibilities.
The fish create an impromptu dance, spinning and leaping with joy as they celebrate their newfound freedom.
Bubbles leads the group in a moment of reflection, recounting the challenges they overcame and how much they have grown.

beats.long_title: A Promise to Remember Each Other
beats.description: The group members make vows to never forget each other and the bond they've formed during their journey.
Each fish decides where they want to go in the vast ocean, ready to start their own individual adventures.
With tears and smiles, Bubbles, Finley, Lola, and Guppy say their goodbyes, wishing each other well on their separate journeys.
Each fish explores different parts of the ocean, looking for places where they can thrive and call home.

beats.long_title: Discovering the Wonders of the Ocean
beats.description: The fish marvel at the various underwater landscapes and the diverse sea creatures they encounter.
The chapter concludes with each fish starting their new life in the ocean, filled with hope and excitement for what lies ahead.
